body_html:
TF_ENABLE_XLA=1 is currently set in the builder configuration. But simply disabling that isn't enough, we also need to blacklist //tensorflow/compiler/... from the set of targets to test.
…
On Tue, Jan 10, 2017 at 4:18 PM drpngx ***@***.***> wrote: How come we are building XLA? I thought configure used TF_ENABLE_XLA=0. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. TF_ENABLE_XLA=1 is currently set in the builder configuration.

But simply disabling that isn't enough, we also need to blacklist
//tensorflow/compiler/... from the set of targets to test.
…

body:
TF_ENABLE_XLA=1 is currently set in the builder configuration.

But simply disabling that isn't enough, we also need to blacklist
//tensorflow/compiler/... from the set of targets to test.

On Tue, Jan 10, 2017 at 4:18 PM drpngx <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> How come we are building XLA? I thought configure used TF_ENABLE_XLA=0.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
